评论概述: You most definitely get what you pay for…
评论详情: I have plenty of pairs of cheap sunglasses… I am not allowed to have expensive glasses anymore because I lose them all the time. Most of the time I find pretty decent pairs.  This ain’t it.  If you have a wider face… you will hate these. These things are incredibly flimsy. There’s not even enough weight to them to push back your hair with, if you like to pop your glasses on and off. You feel like you have to be very dainty with this. They may snap at any second. The lenses that are in these are very decent but that is about the only good thing I can say.
